headline: DDoS Attack Trends for Q3 2021
keywords: DDoS, Attacks, Cloudflare Radar, Ransom DDoS, RDDoS, REvil, VoIP, Meris, DDoS Reports
description: In Q3, 2021 we saw and mitigated record-setting HTTP DDoS attacks, terabit-strong network layer attacks, one of the largest botnets ever deployed (Meris), and more recently, ransom attacks on Voice-over-IP (VoIP) service providers.
